name: Ext_R5_ImagingStudy_reason
title: Cross-version Extension for R5.ImagingStudy.reason for use in FHIR R4B
description: This cross-version extension represents ImagingStudy.reason from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/ImagingStudy|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R4B.

element.short: Why the study was requested / performed
element.definition: Description of clinical condition indicating why the ImagingStudy was requested, and/or Indicates another resource whose existence justifies this Study.
element.comment: `ImagingStudy.reason` maps to R4B `ImagingStudy.reasonCode`. Has no type mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget. `ImagingStudy.reason` maps to R4B `ImagingStudy.reasonReference`. Has no type mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.
